Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The controller is about to grab all the framework of the program. Please note that the current version of program can only be run on Java 9, and need to import outside jar file.
    Author:
    Yuxing HU, Xiaorong HE

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
        Initialize is the method to initialize the GUI when you run the program.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - input of loading site of current data
        rb - default parameter of the FX implement

      • showElements

        public void showElements​()
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.sql.SQLException,
                         java.text.ParseException
        showElements is the most important method to initialize the GUI, which first set pieChart, barChart, scrollBar, comboBox.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - [Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.]
        java.sql.SQLException - [An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors. ]
        java.text.ParseException - [Signals that an error has been reached unexpectedly while parsing.]
        See Also:
        PieChart, BarChart, javafx.scene.control

      • grabData

        private static void grabData​()
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.sql.SQLException,
                             java.text.ParseException
        grabData method is used to grab the data from website and then add them into the database. This method will avoid the data which is duplicate.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - [Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.]
        java.sql.SQLException - [An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors. ]
        java.text.ParseException - [Signals that an error has been reached unexpectedly while parsing.]

      • updateData

        public void updateData​()
        updateData update the GUI when click the botton Search. The new date are determined by condition selections through the contrl elements.

      • openDB

        private static void openDB​(java.lang.String dbPath)
        Open all the quake info from the database
        Parameters:
        dbPath - The abstract path of the database
